onboardingTour.title: Getting Started Tour
onboardingTour.allStepsComplete: Congratulations! You've completed all onboarding steps!
onboardingTour.dismissed: Onboarding tour dismissed. You can restart it anytime from settings.
onboardingTour.dismissConfirmMessage: You can reopen it anytime from the rocket icon in the top toolbar.

findGuide.title: Find This Guide Anytime
findGuide.description: Look for the rocket icon in the top navigation bar. You can click it anytime to reopen this getting started guide and continue where you left off.

chooseLanguage.title: Choose Your Language
chooseLanguage.description: Select your preferred language from the dropdown in the top navigation bar. This will translate the entire application interface to make it easier for you to use.

uploadMedia.title: Upload Your First Media
uploadMedia.description: Start by uploading images, videos, or other content that you want to display on your digital signage screens. You can drag and drop files or use the upload button.

createPlaylist.title: Create Your First Playlist
createPlaylist.description: Organize your content into playlists. Add media files and widgets to create engaging content sequences. You can set display durations and transitions for each item.

createChannel.title: Set Up a Channel
createChannel.description: Channels combine playlists and schedules. Create a channel and assign a default playlist to control what content plays at different times of the day.

registerDevice.title: Register Your First Device
registerDevice.description: Open the player first to get a registration code, then enter that code here to register the device. Tip: you can open a browser player on your computer for testing—use {{playerUrl}}.

assignChannel.title: Assign Channel to Device
assignChannel.description: Link a channel to your device so it knows what content to display. Each device can be assigned to one channel at a time, but you can change it anytime.

advancedPlaylist.title: Create Advanced Playlists with Layouts
advancedPlaylist.description: Take your content to the next level by using layouts to display multiple items simultaneously. Split your screen into zones and show different content in each area.

createTagGroup.title: Organize with Tag Groups
createTagGroup.description: Head to the Tags page and create your first tag group—like 'Location' or 'Campaign'. Groups let you categorize tags into meaningful dimensions that power the tree view.

tagContent.title: Tag Your Content
tagContent.description: Open any media item and assign tags to it. Tags make your content searchable, filterable, and organizable. You can also select multiple items and tag them all at once.

exploreTreeView.title: Explore the Tree View
exploreTreeView.description: Switch to tree view to see your content organized by tag groups. Expand tags to drill down, rearrange dimensions, and discover a whole new way to navigate your library.
